name: Telegram Torrent Leecher
description: A Telegram Torrent (and youtube-dl) Leecher based on Pyrogram. Powered by @MaxxBots

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

DATABASE_URL.description: should be an integer. The BOT API ID of the Telegram Group, where the Leecher should work., Put Group ID

OWNER_ID.description: should be an integer. ID of owner of bot
